description:
Located in the heart of Bushwick between the L and the JMZ, we've made our home a fun retreat set in a classic Brooklyn railroad. The apartment is just steps from countless neighborhood bars & restaurants, and has a bright and spacious bedroom, cozy living room, great (big!) kitchen, and the 'flower' room (our little work room/guest room that can be appointed with a deluxe air bed for additional guests).

Spacious 1 bedroom apartment located in amazing area of Bushwick in Brooklyn, NYC!

Amazing restaurants, art galleries, artists studios, all around the neighborhood with sites to see!

Very close to subway stations Morgan Avenue L train, and Myrtle/Broadway JMZ train stations.

15-20 minute train ride to Union Square station
15-20 minute train ride to Lower East Side Delancey Station

The unit is located in a pre-war building, there are some unique and quirky details! That being said, our bathroom has just a shower/tub and a toilet-- it does not have a sink... Its strange, I know, but hopefully not a deterrent from having you stay with us in such a beautiful space! As we like to think about it, the tub is a very large sink!  :P We just wash our hands in the tub or the nearby kitchen sink :)
name: Lovely Brooklyn Apartment for March!
review: The host canceled this reservation 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
